name: ShtupidZhambieGaem
description:
This is a stupid unfinished game i made, just wanted to do it for fun.

I was making this but then lost motivation and then just decided to release the unfinished build.

Note that when you kill the one zombie the game won't even end, you will be able to freely explore the map.

I highly doubt I'll make another game ever again because I have switched to animation.

CONTROLS:

WASD to move

Click to shoot

F to enter fly mode

kill the one zombie and explore the island!
